column1: Warden of the Keys was a high office of Minas Tirith in Gondor.
At the time of the War of the Ring
column2: the position was filled by Húrin (Warden of the Keys)
column3: who gained the epithet "of the Keys". At the coronation of Aragorn
column4: he opened the Great Gate of Minas Tirith for the new king. Other than that
column5: what other tasks and responsibilities belonged to this office remains unknown.
